pages.about: About Us - Dream Kitchens | Custom Kitchen Design and Renovation MENU ✕ Home About Gallery Form About Us home > About A About Our History At Dream Kitchen, we believe that the kitchen is the heart of every home. Since our founding in 2005, we have been committed to creating kitchens that not only meet the practical needs of our clients but also inspire and delight them. Our team of experienced designers and craftsmen work closely with each client to understand their vision and bring it to life with meticulous attention to detail and the highest quality materials. Our approach is centered on personalization and innovation. We offer a wide range of styles, from modern minimalist designs to timeless classic aesthetics, ensuring that every kitchen we create is unique and tailored to the individual tastes and lifestyle of our clients. We use state-of-the-art technology and sustainable practices to ensure that our kitchens are not only beautiful but also environmentally friendly and built to last. Over the years, we have completed over 420 projects, working with more than 180 contractors and serving 220 satisfied clients. Our success is built on a foundation of trust, excellence, and a passion for what we do. We take pride in transforming ordinary spaces into extraordinary kitchens where families can create memories, share meals, and enjoy life together. At Dream Kitchen, your dream is our mission. Let us help you create the kitchen you have always wanted. S Services We Provide Discover our range of services designed to bring your dream kitchen to life. From concept to completion, we offer a comprehensive approach to ensure every detail is perfect. Custom Kitchen Design Personalized kitchen designs tailored to your unique style and needs. Our expert designers will work with you to create a space that is both beautiful and functional. Kitchen Renovation Transform your old kitchen into a modern masterpiece. Our renovation services include everything from design to installation, ensuring a seamless and stress-free experience. Cabinet Installation High-quality cabinet installation services to maximize your kitchen's storage and functionality. Choose from a wide variety of styles and finishes to match your aesthetic. Kitchen Layout Planning Expert layout planning to ensure optimal use of space in your kitchen. Our team will help you design a layout that enhances both efficiency and aesthetics. Appliance Integration Seamlessly integrate the latest kitchen appliances into your design. Our appliance integration services ensure that your kitchen is equipped with the best technology without compromising on style. S Expertise Skills Custom Kitchen Design 85% Kitchen Renovation 90% Cabinet Installation 75% Get in Touch Leave a request by filling out this form Name Email Message I accept Privacy policy Submit Phone: +91-426-7136954 E-mail: dreamkitchen@gmail.com Adress: X8VQ+653, VishnuPuri, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825301, India Privacy policy Terms and Conditions

pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Dream Kitchens MENU ✕ Home About Gallery Form Privacy Policy At Dream Kitchens, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use and protect it, and your rights regarding your personal data. 1. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us when you use our services or interact with us. This may include: Your name, address, phone number, and email address Payment information, such as credit card details Information about your kitchen design preferences and project details Communications with us, including emails and phone calls Any other information you choose to provide to us 2. How We Use Your Information We use the personal information we collect for the following purposes: To provide and improve our services to you To process your orders and payments To communicate with you about your projects and our services To send you updates, promotions, and marketing communications To personalize your experience and provide you with tailored offers To comply with legal obligations and protect our legal rights 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service providers and contractors who assist us in providing our services Payment processors and financial institutions Legal and regulatory authorities if required by law Other third parties with your consent or as necessary to complete your transactions 4. Data Security We take the security of your personal information seriously and implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect it. This includes: Using encryption to protect data during transmission Storing information in secure systems with access controls Regularly reviewing our security practices to ensure ongoing protection 5. Your Rights You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information. You can also object to the processing of your data and request that we restrict its use. To exercise these rights, please contact us at dreamkitchen@gmail.com. 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Dream Kitchens Email: dreamkitchen@gmail.com Thank you for trusting Dream Kitchens with your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your data is handled with care and respect. Phone: +91-426-7136954 E-mail: dreamkitchen@gmail.com Adress: X8VQ+653, VishnuPuri, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825301, India Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Dream Kitchens MENU ✕ Home About Gallery Form Terms and Conditions Welcome to Dream Kitchens. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing and using our website, you accept and agree to comply with these terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website or services. 1. Definitions In these terms and conditions, the following definitions apply: "Company", "We", "Our", or "Us" refers to Dream Kitchens. "Client", "You", or "Your" refers to the individual using our website and services. "Services" refers to the kitchen design, renovation, and installation services provided by Dream Kitchens. 2. Use of Services You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You must not use our services: In any way that breaches any applicable local, national, or international law or regulation. To send, knowingly receive, upload, download, use, or re-use any material which does not comply with our content standards. To transmit, or procure the sending of, any unsolicited or unauthorized advertising or promotional material. To knowingly introduce any viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs, or other material that is malicious or technologically harmful. 3. Intellectual Property All intellectual property rights in our website and services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are owned by or licensed to Dream Kitchens. You may not reproduce, distribute, or otherwise use any of our intellectual property without our prior written consent. 4. Ordering and Payments When you place an order with Dream Kitchens, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. All orders are subject to acceptance by us, and we will confirm such acceptance by sending you an email confirmation. Payments for services must be made in accordance with the payment terms specified in your order confirmation. 5. Cancellations and Refunds If you wish to cancel your order, you must notify us in writing as soon as possible. Cancellations may be subject to cancellation fees as specified in your order confirmation. Refunds will be processed in accordance with our refund policy, which is available upon request. 6. Limitation of Liability To the fullest extent permitted by law, Dream Kitchens shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our services. Our total liability to you for any claim arising out of or in connection with these terms shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the services. 7. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold Dream Kitchens harmless from and against any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising out of or in connection with your use of our services or any breach of these terms. 8. Changes to Terms and Conditions We may update these terms and conditions from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated terms on our website. Your continued use of our services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms. 9. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Dream Kitchens operates. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that jurisdiction. 10. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at: Dream Kitchens Email: dreamkitchen@gmail.com Thank you for choosing Dream Kitchens. We look forward to working with you and bringing your dream kitchen to life. Phone: +91-426-7136954 E-mail: dreamkitchen@gmail.com Adress: X8VQ+653, VishnuPuri, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825301, India Privacy policy Terms and Conditions
pages.thanks: Thank You - Dream Kitchens Thank You! We are delighted that you chose Dream Kitchens for your kitchen design and renovation needs. Your project is important to us, and we are committed to delivering exceptional results that exceed your expectations. Our team will be in touch with you shortly to discuss the next steps and ensure that we understand all your requirements. If you have any immediate questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at: Dream Kitchens Email: dreamkitchen@gmail.com In the meantime, feel free to browse our website to see more of our work and get inspired by our latest projects.
